events.title: Barcode Printers
events.description: ATPL can assist you with all of your barcode printing needs. We also provide the appropriate software applications, labels, ribbons, media and supplies along with instruction and even repair services.

events.title: Barcode Scanners
events.description: ATPL provides a wide range of barcode scanners and images with wireless functionality. Use general purpose handheld or hands-free scanners in retail, healthcare or light manufacturing operations and rugged scanners on the manufacturing and warehouse floor..

events.title: Hand-held Mobile Devices
events.description: ATPL offers a wide range of handheld mobile computers with voice and data collection functionality, including barcode scanning and image capture as well as wireless networking capabilities.

events.title: Mobile Application Development
events.description: ATPL provides software solutions in Android platform

events.title: Industrial Automation Applications
events.description: ATPL provides software solutions for industrial automation such as Warehouse Management Solutions, Inventory & Asset Tracking, Point of sale, Remote Monitoring & Assistance.etc.,

events.title: Healthcare Applications
events.description: ATPL provides software solutions for Healthcare services such as Patient & Infant RFID RestEasy, Pharmacy, Blood IV Bag Identification, Specimen Tracking,etc.,
